definition: a kind of vase (old)/see 安瓿[an1 bu4]
pooh/pah/bah/(today used as a phonetic component in 部[bu4], 倍[bei4], 培[pei2], 剖[pou1] etc)
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]

sentences.english: Experimental study of infection caused by ampule disinfection and transfusion.
sentences.chinese: 安瓿消毒與輸液引起污染的實驗研究。

sentences.english: Again, there is a recall of sterile ampoules in Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 在瑞士又有一例無菌安瓿被召回。

sentences.english: The recommended single dose is 1 ampoule, given subcutaneously, intramuscularly or intravenously.
sentences.chinese: 建議一次劑量爲1安瓿，皮下，肌肉或靜脈注射給藥。

definition: ancient ceramic three-legged vessel used for cooking with cord markings on the outside and hollow legs
big/cup made of horn/horn wine container
ancient musical intrument shaped as a bell/hoe/spade
ancient bronze food vessel with a round mouth and two or four handles/round basket of bamboo
to hide, to secrete, to repress/to bend
